item.title: In Photos: An Earthquake Rocks Myanmar and Thailand
item.description: The 7.7-magnitude quake caused widespread damage in a country already in chaos because of civil war.

item.title: Live Updates: Nearly 150 Dead in Myanmar After Strong Earthquake, Military Government Says
item.description: The 7.7.-magnitude quake shook a swath of Southeast Asia. In Bangkok, dozens were missing after a skyscraper that was under construction collapsed, ki...

item.title: Building in Bangkok Topples After Powerful Earthquake
item.description: A building in Bangkok that had been under construction collapsed, killing at least eight people, while dozens of workers remained stuck in the rubble.

item.title: What We Know About the Earthquake in Myanmar
item.description: More than 140 people were reported dead in Myanmar, and the earthquake was felt across Southeast Asia.

item.title: Myanmar Earthquake Pushes a Hospital in Mandalay to Its Limits
item.description: Patients had to lie on cardboard or directly on the concrete outside the main hospital in Mandalay. Even before the earthquake, the health care system...
